ops.js: climbLadder({x:137, y:1715, z:-87, triangleId:0, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:4, facingDirection:140, speed:1});
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][2] = pos.x; Bank[6][4] = pos.y; Bank[6][6] = pos.z; Bank[6][8] = pos.triangleId; }
climbLadder({x:122, y:1842, z:36, triangleId:346, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:4, facingDirection:140, speed:1});
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][2] = pos.x; Bank[6][4] = pos.y; Bank[6][6] = pos.z; Bank[6][8] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Cloud}
“This one's been shot, too…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}, what should we do?
{Barret}'s not his normal self.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Barret}
“Stay back!
This's something I gotta deal with.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Red XIII}
“Are you all right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Yuffie}
“Hey, {Cloud}!
Just leave him alone.”{PAUSE}“I mean, he told us to, didn't he?
Then that's that, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Cait Sith}
“A desert prison…
Corel Prison…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Cait Sith}
“Yup, a natural prison
in the middle of the desert…
surrounded entirely by quicksand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Cait Sith}
“I heard that once you get in,
you never get out…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Cait Sith}
“But, there was
one special exception…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cait Sith}
“Whew! That's one of
your friends?
He sure looks
dangerous…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “Wo-ho!
Welcome to Corel Prison.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Hold---it. If you wanna pass,
you're gonna need
the boss's permission.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Cloud}
“We should find {Barret}
before we go out into the desert.”

dialogStrings:
“Hold---it. If you wanna pass,
you're gonna need
the boss's permission.”

{Cait Sith}
“Yup, a natural prison
in the middle of the desert…
surrounded entirely by quicksand.”

{Cait Sith}
“I heard that once you get in,
you never get out…”

{Cait Sith}
“But, there was
one special exception…”

{Barret}
“Stay back!
This's something I gotta deal with.”

{Cait Sith}
“Whew! That's one of
your friends?
He sure looks
dangerous…”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}, what should we do?
{Barret}'s not his normal self.”

{Yuffie}
“Hey, {Cloud}!
Just leave him alone.”{PAUSE}“I mean, he told us to, didn't he?
Then that's that, right?”

{Cloud}
“We should find {Barret}
before we go out into the desert.”
